Title: Heart of the Watchers I
Text:
The rubbing you made showed runes of a foul nature, written in the Black Speech, which Manwyn is not well-versed in; however, he was able to make out something about the "heart" of the stone.

Manwyn has asked you to find one the stone-hearts the runes spoke of by searching lifeless watching-stones located east of Stoneyford, on the way to Dol Guldur.
CompleteText:
You examine the watching-stone closely and discover, through a crack in the stonework, a strange, dark rock. As you pick up the rock, you experience a brief feeling of uneasiness, but it passes quickly.

Collected a heart from a lifeless watching-stone.
